questions.question: Benefit of using investment casting process is:

answers.c: Allows casting of extremely complex parts

explanations.a: Investment casting can achieve smooth and high-quality surface finishes on the cast parts, reducing the need for additional machining or finishing operations.
explanations.b: This process allows for the production of parts with tight tolerances and precise dimensions, often reaching tolerances of up to 0.08 mm (or 80 microns).
explanations.c: Investment casting is capable of producing intricate and complex parts that may be difficult or impossible to create using other casting methods. This includes parts with thin walls, internal cavities, and intricate geometries.
